column4: im running ktorrent on ubuntu but for some reason it eats 70% of a 2GHz core 2 duo then the torrents seem to spike up to normal speed then quickly ramp down to stalled any idea as to whats going on?
Pen: was just what i was used to in windows
err, you can comfortably run KDE apps alongside Gnome ones, it's not really a problem
torrent applications can play dirty with resources .. its not surprising
